definitions: a device for passing a thread through the needle and guides of a sewing machine.
shortDefinitions: device for passing thread through needle and guides of sewing machine

definitions: a factory worker who attaches spools of yarn to a loom.
shortDefinitions: factory worker who attaches spools of yarn

definitions: a device for cutting a spiral ridge on the outside of a screw or the inside of a hole.
shortDefinitions: device for cutting spiral ridge on outside of screw
